text: Face the Music is the fifth studio album by British band Electric Light Orchestra. It was released in September, 1975 through United Artists Records. It went to number 8 in the United States, number 11 in the Netherlands, number 24 in Italy, number 30 in Australia and number 31 in Canada. It did not chart in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== All songs written by Jeff Lynne. == References == Category:1975 albums Category:Electric Light Orchestra albums
title: Face the Music (Electric Light Orchestra album)
